sense.gloss: (a) stop (e.g. in a timber joint, or at the end of a kanji stroke)
(temporarily) studying at another school (to learn a specific skill)
to stop, to stay (e.g. the night), to cease, to put an end to
to contain, to keep (in position, in place), to limit
to record (e.g. a fact), to retain
heeding, paying attention, bearing in mind
to stop (moving), to come to a stop
to stop (doing, working, being supplied), to come to a halt, to cease, to be stopped, to be suspended
being left unattended to (of one's studies, etc.), neglecting
reservation, putting on hold, deferment, withholding
care-taking, house-sitting, house-watching, staying at home
detention (usu. during investigation), imprisonment, poundage, custody
registered mail, registered post, registration (of mail)
(putting on) record, writing down, noting down, registry
stop (bus, tram, etc.), station, stopping place
repeating a year (at school), staying in the same class for another year
dissuasion (from resigning, leaving, etc.), persuading (to stay)
article left behind (at a crime scene, after death, etc.)
general delivery, counter collection, poste restante
to bring down (an animal, opponent, etc.), to kill, to shoot dead, to shoot down
to prevent, to suppress (a cough), to hold back (tears), to hold (one's breath), to relieve (pain)
to stop (someone from doing something), to dissuade, to forbid, to prohibit
to notice, to be aware of, to concentrate on, to pay attention to, to remember, to bear in mind
to fix (in place), to fasten, to tack, to pin, to nail, to button, to staple
to detain, to keep in custody
to remain, to abide, to stay (in the one place)
to be limited to, to be confined to, to only account for
stopping at, going no further than
to stop (in one's tracks), to come to a stop, to halt, to pause, to stand still
preventing (someone) from leaving, confinement, keeping indoors, inducement to stay
closing a pachinko machine (after it has paid out its designated maximum)
to determine (esp. a culprit or underlying cause), to pin down, to ascertain, to locate, to identify
(thing that) grows on one over time
acid reflux, bile reflux, pyrosis, stomach acid (when it enters the esophagus), heartburn, indigestion, water brash
to (call and) stop, to call (someone) to stop, to hail (e.g. a taxi)

r_ele.r: ざいりゅうきかんこうしんきょか

sense.gloss: Japanese residents in another country, Japanese expatriates

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓くも↑留↑↓と↓まるも↑自由↑↓じゆう↓にしなさい。
sdata.e: You may go or stay at will.

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓くも↑留↑↓と↓まるもあなたの↑自由↑↓じゆう↓です。
sdata.e: You may go or stay at will.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑留守↑↓るす↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓にメグから↑電話↑↓でんわ↓があった。
sdata.e: Meg called you during your absence.

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓くも↑留↑↓と↓まるも↑君↑↓きみ↓↑次第↑↓しだい↓だよ。
sdata.e: You can go or stay, as you wish.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑留守↑↓るす↓だったので、がっかりした。
sdata.e: I was disappointed at your absence.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓くにバスの↑停留所↑↓ていりゅうじょ↓があります。
sdata.e: There is a bus stop near by.

sdata.j: ↑教授↑↓きょうじゅ↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑書↑↓か↓き↑留↑↓と↓めておいてくれませんか。
sdata.e: Can you take notes for me during the professor's talk?

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓は↑遺留↑↓いりゅう↓↑品↑↓ひん↓の↑一↑↓ひと↓つから↑突↑↓とっ↓きとめられた。
sdata.e: The burglar was traced by one of the things he had left on the scene.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓は↑遺留↑↓いりゅう↓↑品↑↓ひん↓の↑一↑↓ひと↓つから↑足↑↓あし↓がついた。
sdata.e: The burglar was traced by one of the things he had left on the scene.

sdata.j: ↑休暇↑↓きゅうか↓で↑留守↑↓るす↓をしている↑間↑↓かん↓、↑子供↑↓こども↓のめんどうをみてくれますか。
sdata.e: Would you look after my children while I am away on vacation?

sdata.j: ↑鬼↑↓おに↓の↑留守↑↓るす↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓。
sdata.e: When the cat is away, the mice will play.

sdata.j: ↑記者↑↓きしゃ↓は↑話↑↓はな↓されたことはすべて↑書↑↓か↓き↑留↑↓と↓めた。
sdata.e: The reporter took down everything that was said.

sdata.j: リポーターは↑言↑↓い↓われたことをすべて↑書↑↓か↓き↑留↑↓と↓めた。
sdata.e: The reporter took down everything that was said.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓、イギリスに↑半年↑↓はんとし↓↑留学↑↓りゅうがく↓しました。
sdata.e: I studied in England for six months when I was a student.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓たちは↑先生↑↓せんせい↓の↑言↑↓い↓ったことをもらさず↑書↑↓か↓き↑留↑↓と↓めた。
sdata.e: The students noted down every word the teacher said.

sdata.j: ↑外国↑↓がいこく↓↑人↑↓じん↓↑留学生↑↓りゅうがくせい↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓たちに↑援助↑↓えんじょ↓を↑求↑↓もと↓めた。
sdata.e: Foreign students demanded help from us.

sdata.j: ↑絵↑↓え↓の↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓をするためにフランスに↑留学↑↓りゅうがく↓します。
sdata.e: I'm going to France to study painting.

sdata.j: ↑皆↑↓みな↓↑留守↑↓るす↓だというのに、↑不思議↑↓ふしぎ↓なことに↑家中↑↓いえじゅう↓の↑電灯↑↓でんとう↓がついていた。
sdata.e: Strange to say, all the lights in the house were on, though no one was at home.

sdata.j: ↑海外↑↓かいがい↓へ↑留学↑↓りゅうがく↓に↑出↑↓で↓かける↑学生↑↓がくせい↓の↑数↑↓かず↓が↑毎年↑↓まいとし↓↑増加↑↓ぞうか↓している。
sdata.e: The number of students going abroad to study is increasing each year.

sdata.j: ↑家族↑↓かぞく↓で↑一↑↓いっ↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓↑留守↑↓るす↓にします。
sdata.e: My family will be away for a week.

sdata.j: ↑夏休↑↓なつやす↓みの↑間↑↓あいだ↓は、ずっと↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑留守↑↓るす↓にしていました。
sdata.e: I was away from home all through the summer vacation.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓びとも↑奴隷↑↓どれい↓の↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓に↑留↑↓と↓め↑置↑↓お↓かれてはならない。
sdata.e: No one shall be held in slavery.

sdata.j: ↑英語↑↓えいご↓を↑話↑↓はな↓すことを↑向上↑↓こうじょう↓させることが、↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑留学↑↓りゅうがく↓の↑目的↑↓もくてき↓らしいね。
sdata.e: Developing his ability of speaking English, it seems, is his purpose of studying abroad.

sdata.j: ↑異様↑↓いよう↓な↑光景↑↓こうけい↓が↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑目↑↓め↓に↑留↑↓とま↓った。
sdata.e: A strange sight greeted her eyes.

sdata.j: ロンドンに↑留学↑↓りゅうがく↓されるって↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓ですか？
sdata.e: Is it true that you are going to study in London?

sdata.j: もっと↑若↑↓わか↓ければ、↑海外↑↓かいがい↓に↑留学↑↓りゅうがく↓するのに。
sdata.e: If I were younger, I would go abroad to study.

sdata.j: もし↑留守↑↓るす↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓に↑誰↑↓だれ↓かが↑来↑↓き↓たら、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑夕方↑↓ゆうがた↓まで↑帰↑↓かえ↓らないと↑言↑↓い↓ってくれ。
sdata.e: If anyone comes in my absence, tell him that I won't come back till evening.

sdata.j: もし↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちの↑生↑↓う↓まれであったなら、イギリスに↑留学↑↓りゅうがく↓したことであろう。
sdata.e: Born in a rich family, he would have studied in England.

sdata.j: もし↑電話↑↓でんわ↓がかかってきたら、↑居留守↑↓いるす↓を↑使↑↓つか↓っておいて。
sdata.e: I'm not here if anybody calls.

sdata.j: もし↑誰↑↓だれ↓か↑会↑↓あ↓いに↑来↑↓き↓ても、↑留守↑↓るす↓だと↑言↑↓い↓いなさい。
sdata.e: If anyone comes to see me, tell him that I am out.
